definitions.definition: One who, or that which, clarifies .
A speech act intended to clarify or correct one's own prior utterance.
A vessel in which the process of clarification is conducted.
An additional card used to enhance or explain the primary cards in a spread .

main_definition: One who, or that which, clarifies .
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) A speech act intended to clarify or correct one's own prior utterance.
A vessel in which the process of clarification is conducted.
( cartomancy ) An additional card used to enhance or explain the primary cards in a spread .
